attributes.action: Freeze all politicians pay rises from 2020 till 2022 to balance the budget.
attributes.additional_details: The public sector workers have only just come out of a 7 year pay freeze that was imposed to reduce the deficiet.  These public sector workers are the people that are on the front line working through the Coronavirus, that every day go to work playing russian roulette with their lives.They risk their lives for others, and even saved the Prime Ministers life during the pandemic yet they are now being unfairly  targeted financially again in a time where people, all people are struggling!
attributes.background: MP's and Gov staff are due a pay rise this year and it would seem fair that their pay be frozen for at least the next two years while the UK recovers financially from the 'Coronavirus'.  The Chancellor is happy for the frontline workers to do this therefore he should be happy to do it himself.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
